attributes.action: stop any further petitions from J Richards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This person has posted nearly 400 petitions, most of which are ridiculous (benches, political wives, freebies?) and many, being semi-literate, are incomprehensible. This is an abuse of this democratic process.  Free speech is invaluable but his/her petitions are just wasteful nonsense.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
